    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INDEX_DATA_OFFSET_BITS
      Number of least-significant bits used to hold the data offset info in index entries.
      static long INDEX_DATA_OFFSET_MASK
      Mask used to extract the data offset info from an index entry.
      static long MIN_CYCLE_LENGTH 
      static int THREAD_ID_BITS
      Number of most-significant bits used to hold the thread id in index entries.
      static long THREAD_ID_MASK
      Mask used to validate that the thread id does not exceed the allocated number of bits.

    • Field Detail

      • MIN_CYCLE_LENGTH

        public static final long MIN_CYCLE_LENGTH

      • THREAD_ID_BITS

        public static final int THREAD_ID_BITS
        Number of most-significant bits used to hold the thread id in index entries. The remaining least-significant bits of the index entry are used for the data offset info.

      • THREAD_ID_MASK

        public static final long THREAD_ID_MASK
        Mask used to validate that the thread id does not exceed the allocated number of bits.

      • INDEX_DATA_OFFSET_BITS

        public static final int INDEX_DATA_OFFSET_BITS
        Number of least-significant bits used to hold the data offset info in index entries.

      • INDEX_DATA_OFFSET_MASK

        public static final long INDEX_DATA_OFFSET_MASK
        Mask used to extract the data offset info from an index entry.

      • lastIndex

        public long lastIndex()
        This method returns the very last index in the chronicle. Not to be confused with lastWrittenIndex(), this method returns the actual last index by scanning the underlying data even the appender has not been activated.
        Specified by:
        lastIndex in interface Chronicle
        Returns:
        The last index in the file
